thread.title: Ricki and the Flash's Rick Springfield on Meryl Streep, writing and depression
thread.title_full: Ricki and the Flash's Rick Springfield on Meryl Streep, writing and depression

title: Ricki and the Flash's Rick Springfield on Meryl Streep, writing and depression
text:
Ricki and the Flash's Rick Springfiel... Ricki and the Flash's Rick Springfield on Meryl Streep, writing and depression 2 hrs ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
Rick Springfield is just a couple of metres away when I realise I'm humming Jessie's Girl loud enough for him to hear . Sorry, I say; I've had it stuck in my head for days.   Sydney Morning Herald.
